desmoj.core.report

Class ASCIITableFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.core.report.AbstractTableFormatter
      • desmoj.core.report.ASCIITableFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TableFormatter

    public class ASCIITableFormatter
extends AbstractTableFormatter
    A table formatter class for writing simulation output to tab delimited ASCII (e.g. for import into statistics tools or spreadsheet software).

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class desmoj.core.report.AbstractTableFormatter

        _currentReporter, out, rowOpen, tableOpen

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the document by closing open rows and tables and writing the Desmo-J version footer
      void closeRow()
      Writes a newline character
      void closeTable()
      Writes 2 newline characters
      void closeTableNoTopTag()
      Calls closeTable
      java.lang.String getFileFormat() 
      void open(java.lang.String name)
      Opens the table (without effect for ASCII tables)

      Writes a line of asterisks and a newline.

      • openTable

        public void openTable(java.lang.String heading)
        Opens the table by writing the heading and a newline character
        Parameters:
        heading - heading to write
        See Also:
        TableFormatter.openTable(java.lang.String)

      • writeCell

        public void writeCell(java.lang.String s,
                      int spanning)
        Writes the given string followed by a separator character
        Parameters:
        s - string to write
        spanning - number of cells to span (ignored)
        See Also:
        desmoj.core.report.TableFormatter#writeCell(java.lang.String)

      • writeHeading

        public void writeHeading(int i,
                         java.lang.String s)
        Writes the given heading enclosed in asterisks followed by a newline character. The integer parameter's value has no effect on ASCII tables.
        Parameters:
        i - heading size (without effect)
        s - heading to write
        See Also:
        TableFormatter.writeHeading(int, java.lang.String)

      • writeHeadingCell

        public void writeHeadingCell(java.lang.String s)
        Writes a heading cell. Heading cells are not formatted in a special way in ASCII tables.
        Parameters:
        s - heading to write
        See Also:
        TableFormatter.writeHeadingCell(java.lang.String)

      • writeHorizontalRuler

        public void writeHorizontalRuler()
        Writes a line of asterisks and a newline.
        See Also:
        TableFormatter.writeHorizontalRuler()

      • open

        public void open(java.lang.String name)
        Opens the table (without effect for ASCII tables)
        Parameters:
        name - table name (not displayed)

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the document by closing open rows and tables and writing the Desmo-J version footer

      • getFileFormat

        public java.lang.String getFileFormat()
        Returns:
        "txt"
